item.title: 2ND topic - Item Help!
item.dc:creator: @nd_w0t nd w0t
item.description:
@nd_w0t wrote:

Second topic… Still no1 has answered my question… How do i make it so, you need a certain level to wield an item… And no, i dont want to add this under, public int GetCLStrength…

	if (ItemName.contains("XXX")) {
	return YY;
	}

XXXX - ItemName…
YY - Level…

I was thinking of like…

if (playerLevel[2] >= 99) {
(What ever the code is here)..
} else {
sendMessage("You dont have the correct levels to wield this item!");
}

But then again, i probably wrong… So can anyone help me out?..

Read full topic
